ginplugin.name: CMIS Content Provider
ginplugin.description: This ContentProvider plugin is able to connect to a file repository with CMIS support and provided files as Content objects to the iQser GIN Server.

params.param: The username to connect to the repository.
The password to connect to the repository.
Content type mappings to change the default content type name; e.g. [CMIS_FOLDER=iQserFolder][CMIS_DOCUMENT=iQserDocument]
The base folder to use for synchronization; if omitted root folder will be used; if not present it will be created automatically by the GIN plugin
Set to true if folders should be create a content object too, otherwise only documents will be created. Default is false.
